Posts.Content: StacyMarie wrote: I'm looking for an excellant BS that will do a Prophylactic Nipple Sparing Mastectomy in Indiana or Chicago.  My BS said she will do a mastectomy for me, but she does not believe in a nipple sparing mastectomy.  I'm a little worried that I'm leaving some breast tissue behind, but after some research I feel like it's the best option for me.  (Let me know if I'm wrong please!!)  I'm 31 and was diagnosed with LCIS.  I have very dense breast and my Mammograms and MRI's are had to read.  Everything lights up.  Dx 12/23/2011, LCIS, Stage 0 Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Looking for an excellent BS & PS that does NSBM StacyMarie dobie

Posts.Content: Apr 4, 2012 04:35PM StacyMarie wrote: has anyone had a prophylactic nipple sparing mastectomy at the mayo clinic in MN?  Did you have 1 step immediate reconstruction and if so how do your girls look?
